headline.main: Oman Air Says Orders 20 Boeing 737s; To Double Fleet by 2020
headline.print_headline: Oman Air Says Orders 20 Boeing 737s; To Double Fleet by 2020

docs.snippet: Flag carrier Oman Air has ordered 20 Boeing Co 737 aircraft as part of a plan to double its fleet to 70 planes by 2020, Chief Executive Paul Gregorowitsch said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Flag carrier Oman Air has ordered 20 Boeing Co 737 aircraft as part of a plan to double its fleet to 70 planes by 2020, Chief Executive Paul Gregorowitsch said on Monday.

headline.main: Carter-Williams Leads Bucks to 95-91 Victory Over Bulls
headline.print_headline: Carter-Williams Leads Bucks to 95-91 Victory Over Bulls

docs.snippet: Michael Carter-Williams had 21 points and 10 rebounds to lead the Milwaukee Bucks to a rare 95-91 victory at home over the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Carter-Williams had 21 points and 10 rebounds to lead the Milwaukee Bucks to a rare 95-91 victory at home over the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Iraq claims victory over IS in Tikrit
headline.sub: Iraq claims victory over IS in Tikrit

headline.main: Piutau Confirms Overseas Contract, World Cup Hopes in Doubt
headline.print_headline: Piutau Confirms Overseas Contract, World Cup Hopes in Doubt

docs.snippet: Auckland Blues utility back Charles Piutau has confirmed he has signed a two-year contract with Irish side Ulster and will leave New Zealand in July 2016, though his rugby World Cup hopes could now be in jeopardy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Auckland Blues utility back Charles Piutau has confirmed he has signed a two-year contract with Irish side Ulster and will leave New Zealand in July 2016, though his rugby World Cup hopes could now be in jeopardy.

headline.main: Flyers Top Penguins, 4-1, Despite Crosby’s 300th Goal
headline.print_headline: Flyers Top Penguins 4-1 Despite Crosby's 300th Goal

docs.snippet: The Philadelphia Flyers are ticking off the days until their frustrating and inconsistent season ends. If the Pittsburgh Penguins can't get healthy — or stay out of the penalty box — it won't be long before they are doing the same....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Flyers are ticking off the days until their frustrating and inconsistent season ends. If the Pittsburgh Penguins can't get healthy — or stay out of the penalty box — it won't be long before they are doing the same.

headline.main: AP Source: Texas to Meet With VCU's Smart to Present Offer
headline.print_headline: AP Source: Texas to Meet With VCU's Smart to Present Offer

docs.snippet: Texas athletic director Steve Patterson is scheduled to travel Thursday to meet with Virginia Commonwealth coach Shaka Smart to make an offer to coach the Longhorns, a person with knowledge of the trip told The Associated Press....
docs.lead_paragraph: Texas athletic director Steve Patterson is scheduled to travel Thursday to meet with Virginia Commonwealth coach Shaka Smart to make an offer to coach the Longhorns, a person with knowledge of the trip told The Associated Press.

headline.main: Assistant Fire Chief in Indiana Demoted After Tying Noose
headline.print_headline: Assistant Fire Chief in Indiana Demoted After Tying Noose

docs.snippet: An assistant fire chief in Indiana has accepted a demotion after tying a rope into a noose in the presence of a black firefighter whose wife belongs to the family of a lynching victim....
docs.lead_paragraph: An assistant fire chief in Indiana has accepted a demotion after tying a rope into a noose in the presence of a black firefighter whose wife belongs to the family of a lynching victim.
